# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-to-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="08818-102">Menambahkan emojis atau GIF ke pesan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08818-102">Add emojis or GIFs to messages</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="08818-103">Membalas email yang sudah ada atau pilih **pesan baru**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08818-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="08818-104">Pilih wajah smiley</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08818-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="08818-105">di bagian bawah jendela penulisan untuk membuka panel ekspresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08818-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="08818-106">Cari dan pilih emoji atau GIF yang ingin Anda masukkan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08818-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="08818-107">Untuk informasi lebih lanjut, lihat [menyesuaikan pesan email Outlook di web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08818-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
